item.title: Iranian forces massacred protesters fleeing burning market, witnesses say - The Washington Post
item.description: Iranian forces massacred protesters fleeing burning market, witnesses say The Washington Post"A Literal Bloodbath": Security Forces Kill 11 Protesters in Masur Crackdown IranWireHaunting image shows pile of abandoned shoes after Iran’s bloodthirsty regime burned protesters to death: ‘Iranian Holocaust’ New York PostLetter from Tehran: A Local Journalist Tells the Story of a Massacre meforum.orgKermanshah; A Field Report on the Organized Suppressi…
